name: CROPS
description: 'Crops' refer to cultivated plants or agricultural produce that are grown and harvested for food, feed, fiber, fuel, or other economic purposes. These plants are intentionally planted and managed by humans in fields, orchards, gardens, or other agricultural settings. Crops play a crucial role in providing sustenance for humans and livestock, as well as raw materials for industries such as textiles, biofuels, and pharmaceuticals.

name: FERTILIZERS
description: Fertilizers are substances applied to soil or plants to provide essential nutrients that promote growth and enhance productivity. They can be broadly categorized into two main types based on their origin and composition

name: PESTICIDES
description: Certainly! Pesticides are chemical substances or mixtures used to control, repel, or kill pests that can harm crops, livestock, humans, or the environment. They are a crucial tool in agriculture, forestry, and public health for managing pests that threaten food production, human health, and property.
